document.full_text: tokyo electric power co could face compensation claims topping $130 billion if japan's worst nuclear crisis drags on, bank of america-merrill lynch estimated, fuelling expectations japan's government will step in to save asia's largest utility.
document.title: tokyo electric claims could top $130 billion on japan
lines_and_colors: tokyo electric power co could face compensation claims topping $130 billion if japan's worst nuclear crisis drags on, bank of america-merrill lynch estimated, fuelling expectations japan's government will step in to save asia's largest utility.
